name: Doctor Them: Blood Bargain
description:
When stuck, think of Hyper Jump in the bargain store!

Do to time constraints, there is no proper ending. The goal is to get the battery and go back to the time machine.

Conttrols:

Movement - WASD/Bindable

Jump - Space

Hyper Jump - Shift

F1 - Bargain

Textures used: https://opengameart.org/content/goobers-texture-pack-01

lava shader: https://github.com/Gonkee/Gonkees-Shaders/blob/master/lava.shader

Credits:

gorRgolem: Code, 3D

jonas1426: Programmer

Rodrigo Boechat: Music Composer and SFX

SereneMango: 3D Modeler and Animation
